title: Slow cooker butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['1 large butternut squash, peeled and chopped', '1 large tin sweetcorn, drained', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 white onion, chopped', '3 chicken stock cubes, crumbled', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon curry powder, or to taste', 'mixed dried herbs to taste', '1 to 2 handfuls red lentils', 'water to cover', '2 to 4 tablespoons cream (optional)']
